document.full_text: around 300 tunisians held a protest in the capital on wednesday against an imminent visit to their country by secretary of state hillary clinton, witnesses said.
document.title: around 300 tunisians protest ahead of clinton visit
lines_and_colors: around 300 tunisians held a protest in the capital on wednesday against an imminent visit to their country by secretary of state hillary clinton, witnesses said.
